MultiScaleOT: Documentation¶

MultiScaleOT is a library for numerical optimal transport implemented in C++. A front-end for Python 3 with numpy and scipy is available (implemented with pybind11).

This project and its documentation are far from complete and still under construction. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.
